(Program
  (Case
    (Identifier)
    (When
      (Args
      { (Identifier)
      ->(Identifier) })
    { (Identifier)
    ->(When
      {+(Args
        {+(Identifier)+})+}
      {+(Args
        {+(Other "splat_argument"
          {+(Identifier)+})+})+}
      {+(Identifier)+}
      {+(Else)+}) }
    {-(Else
      {-(Identifier)-})-})))
